She won "Best Actress" awards at the 35th PMPC Star Awards for Movies and Entertainment Editors' Choice Awards for Movies, or The EDDY'S 2019 for her outstanding portrayal as George in The Hows of Us".
BuKathryn Chandria Manuel Bernardo (amuru March 26, 1996) bu onye omekorita Filipina nke amara ama maka oru ya na usoro onyonyo Mara Clara (2010 – 2011)
, Pangako Sa 'Yo (2015–2016), na La Luna Sangre (2017–2018)

A makwaara ya maka ọrụ na fim She's Dating the Gangster (2014), Crazy Beautiful You (2015), Barcelona: A Love Untold (2016), The Hows of Us (2018), na Ndewo, Lovehụnanya, Goodbye (2019), Abụọ n'ime ha bụ ihe nkiri Filipino kacha enweta ego n'oge niile.
Ndị Asia toro Bernardo dị ka eze nwanyị igbe igbe nke ọgbọ ya
Ugbu a ọ bụ naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri Filipino nwere ihe nkiri abụọ na-enweta ihe karịrị nde P800 nke ọ bụla
Forbes Asia depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị Asia-Pacific kacha ewu ewu na soshal midia
Metro Society tinyere ya na ndepụta nke Kachasị Mmetụta na Social Media
EdukCircle depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ama ama nke afọ iri
A mụrụ Bernardo na March 26, 1996, na Cabanatuan na Philippines
Ndị mụrụ ya bụ Luzviminda na Teodore Bernardo
Azụlitere ya na ụmụnne ya atọ: ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ aha ya bụ Chrysler na Kaye, na otu nwanne aha ya bụ Kevin
Ọ bụ ya bụ ọdụdụ nwa n’ezinụlọ ya.
A zụlitere Bernardo ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Iglesia ni Cristo,  mana ọ na-eme Okpukpe Protestant nke Evangelical ugbu a
Na 2018, Bernardo kwuru na ya na onye ya na ya na-emekọ ihe na ihuenyo, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Daniel Padilla na-enwe mmekọrịta ogologo oge kemgbe May 25, 2012
Bernardo gụrụ akwụkwọ na OB Montessori Center Inc
tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ mpụta mbụ na 2003
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ, ma na-aga ugbu a kọleji Enderun, Taguig, ebe ọ na-amụ ahịa
Bernardo malitere ime ihe na 2003, pụtara dị ka Cielo na-eto eto na ABS-CBN Ọ Pụrụ Ịbụ Gị
Na 2006, ọ rutere ọrụ mbụ ya na usoro TV Super Ingo na-egwu Maya, mmasị ịhụnanya nke onye isi
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche na ihe ngosi ABS-CBN ndị ọzọ dị ka Krystala na Vietnam Rose tupu ọ daa ebe na-adịgide adịgide na ihe nkiri Kiddie hit Goin 'Bulilit
Na 2010, Bernardo nwetara ọrụ dị egwu, nke mbụ bụ Victoria na-eto eto na ABS-CBN's Magkaribal na Jenny na-eto eto na GMA's Loveless Love
Ọ dabara na, ha abụọ ewepụtara na June 28, 2010
Ọrụ ọganihu Bernardo bụ ya dị ka Mara David/Mara Del Valle na mmegharị ihe nkiri telivishọn 1992 Mara Clara ya na onye otu ya na enyi ya kacha mma bụ Julia Montes
Kemgbe mmalite ya, usoro ihe onyonyo a ka bụ onye ndu na-agbanwe agbanwe na ọkwa izizi
N'ịkwado ihe ịga nke ọma ya, a họpụtara ihe ngosi ahụ na 2011 Banff World Media Festival 's "Telenovelas & Soap Operas" Atiya ma gosi ọdịnihu Bernardo dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama
Mgbe primetime teleserye kwụsịrị, Bernardo malitere ịpụta n'ehihie Sunday na-egosi na- eto eto
Mmekọrịta ya na Julia Montes, ihe nkiri ahụ gosipụtara kpakpando ndị ọzọ na-abịa ABS-CBN dị ka Kiray Celis, Diego Loyzaga na Daniel Padilla
Na ihe nkiri ahụ, Bernardo rụrụ ọrụ nke Ella dị afọ 15 bụ onye ya na nne ya nanị ya na-azụ ụmụ bi
Ihe ngosi a gosipụtara nke ọma, n'ogo na ọnụọgụ 2 n'ozuzu ya na ngọngọ ehihie nke ihie onyonyo primetime
Ọrụ ihe nkiri Bernardo malitere na 2004 na ihe nkiri Gagamboy
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ nanị na 2011 mgbe ya, ya na Mara Clara co-star Julia Montes, nwetara ọrụ ndu na fim Way Back Home

Ihe nkiri ahụ meghere na mbụ na ihe dị ka nde PHP 18 (US $ 428,571) n'ime izu mbụ ya nke karịrị ihe ngosi ihe nkiri si mba ọzọ n'oge ahụ, dịka The Smurfs na Conan the Barbarian dị ka Box Office Mojo si kwuo
N'otu afọ ahụ, Bernardo gụnyere na Regal Film's Metro Manila Film Festival ntinye Shake, Rattle & Roll 13
Bernardo weghaara ụdị egwu site na ikụnye otu n'ime ọrụ ndị isi nke akụkọ nke abụọ nke ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Parola
Ọrụ ya nwetara nyocha dị mma
Na ntụle maka ClickTheCity.com, Philbert Dy toro omume Bernardo: “Arụmọrụ dị egwu sitere na Kathryn Bernardo jikọtara ha niile
Ọ nwere ike ịbụ otu n'ime ihe kacha mma si na Shake Rattle and Roll pụta."
Bernardo gbara egwu na Princess na m, usoro ihe nkiri ịhụnanya / ihe nkiri royalty-themed, na-esote ihe ịga nke ọma na- eto eto

Site na nkedo nke Daniel Padilla gbara n'akụkụ dị ka Gino Dela Rosa, Enrique Gil dị ka Prince Jao na Bernardo dị ka Mikay/Princess Areeyah, teleserye na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ihe kachasị mma, bụ ihe ngosi Philippine mbụ a ga-agba na Bhutan
Ewezuga Padilla na Gil dị ka ndị isi Bernardo na ihe nkiri ahụ, Pilipinas Got Talent Season 3 onye bụbu onye asọmpi Khalil Ramos na-akpọ Mikay hụrụ n'anya na ezigbo enyi Kiko
Ndị omekome ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Gretchen Barretto na Albert Martinez sonyeere nkedo nke kpakpando
Ihe ngosi a nwetara ọkwa na nlebanya na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya dị ka ihe ngosi mbụ mbụ na Septemba 2012, na-emepekwu ọnụ ụzọ maka ọrụ na-egbuke egbuke nke Bernardo

N'August 2013, ya na Daniel Padilla na-akpọsa usoro telivishọn ọzọ: Ga-ekweta na nke Bernardo na-egwu Chichay Tampipi, nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri na ụma nke na-ejikọta ya na enyi ya bụ nwata bụ Joaquin Manansala (Padilla) mgbe ọtụtụ afọ gasịrị; Chichay dara maka nwa okoro ahụ bara ọgaranya n'agbanyeghị ọdịiche akụ na ụba ha na ndụ ezinụlọ ha, na-ezute ihe mgbochi siri ike nke na-anwale ịhụnanya ha
Got to believe bụkwa ihe egwu egwu na telivishọn mbụ, na-achịkọta pasenti 38.6 na ọkwa n'oge mgbasa ozi ikpeazụ nke ihe nkiri ahụ wee tinye na Nke 2 na ndepụta ọkwa TV nke Kantar Media nke mba
Bernardo bụ onye mbụ na naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri Filipina nke mebiri akara ₱ nde 800 maka ihe nkiri abụọ
Otu bụ na 2018 maka The Hows of Anyị na nke ọzọ bụ Ndewo, Love, Goodbye for 2019
Bernardo ugbu a na-ejide ihe nkiri Filipino kachasị elu nke oge niile maka ihe nkiri Ndewo, Lovehụnanya, Goodbye
Ọ ghọkwara ihe nkiri Filipino kacha enweta ego na Middle East, Australia, na North America
Ndewo, Lovehụnanya, Goodbye mebiri ndekọ igbe igbe nke ihe nkiri Filipino ọ bụla

She won "Best Actress" awards at the 35th PMPC Star Awards for Movies and Entertainment Editors' Choice Awards for Movies, or The EDDY'S 2019 for her outstanding portrayal as George in The Hows of Us".
E nyekwara Bernardo ihe nrite “Box Office Queen” maka ihe nkiri blockbuster Barcelona: A Love Untold na 48th Guillermo Mendoza Box Office Awards
Na 2020, ọ meriri dị ka "Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma" na Gawad Pasado, yana Judy Ann Santos-Agoncillo
wee merie "Film Acting Awardee" na Gawad Tanglaw, "Onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke afọ" na Aral Parangal Awards, "Best Actress" na Village Pipol Awards

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, a họpụtara ya maka "Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma" na Film Academy of the Philippines, Gawad Urian, na Filipino Academy of Movie Arts and Sciences (FAMAS), ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara ugbu a na "Onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke afọ" na PMPC Star Awards maka ihe nkiri
na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nhọpụta grandslam n'ime otu anọ na-enye onyinye onyinye na Philippines.
